Storing for each category¶

Categories is a class, where each object has the following attributes

class categories.Categories(name, index)¶

Bases: object

A class used to represent a category of a feature. A category represents a choice given in a question.

name¶

the name of the category

Type

str

index¶

the index is used to identify the categories. It preserves the order of the categories in case of ordinal features.

Type

int

prob¶

the occurence probability of a category of a feature in a particular population

Type

float

entropy¶

the entropy of a category of a feature in a particular population given by entropy = -p * log(p) where p is the occurence probability

Type

float

Finding Features

Next topic

Calculating Distances
